description: Daily machine-readable operations plan for monitoring and sustaining Oracle Cloud (OCI/IDCS) security posture, compliance alignment, and MITRE ATT&CK coverage.

tasks.name: Cloud Guard and Security Zones Triage
tasks.objective: Identify and remediate new high/critical Cloud Guard problems and security zone violations.

steps: Open OCI Cloud Guard problems view filtered to last 24h high/critical severity.
Assign each problem an owner, ticket, and ETA; validate containment plans.
Verify security zones applied to intended compartments and review any violations/exceptions.
Confirm detector and responder recipes align with enterprise baseline configuration.

success_criteria.pass: 0 unassigned high/critical problems and no unauthorized security-zone drift.
success_criteria.warning: Any high/critical problem open >8h without owner or <=2 violations pending approved exceptions.
success_criteria.fail: Critical problems open >24h without containment or resources operating with unapproved security-zone violations.

tasks.name: IAM Policy and Entity Delta Review
tasks.objective: Detect unauthorized IAM policy changes and prevent privilege creep in OCI IAM and IDCS.

steps: Export current OCI IAM policies and compare against prior snapshot for changes.
List users, groups, dynamic groups, federations created or modified within 24h; validate with change tickets.
Flag overbroad policies (e.g., manage all-resources) and propose least-privilege adjustments.
Archive signed diffs and approvals in controlled repository.

success_criteria.pass: All IAM deltas mapped to approved requests, diffs stored with sign-off, no new broad policies.
success_criteria.warning: Unexplained changes detected but under investigation for <8h.
success_criteria.fail: Broad/high-privilege policies or groups created without approval or orphaned admin users detected.

tasks.name: Authentication Anomaly Hunt
tasks.objective: Detect suspicious authentication activity indicating credential abuse in IDCS/OCI.

steps: Pull IDCS authentication logs and OCI Audit events for last 24 hours.
Identify impossible travel, TOR/VPN origins, excessive failures, MFA denials, and first-time token use.
Create incident tickets for high-risk events and apply IP blocks or conditional access per playbook.

success_criteria.pass: High-risk auth anomalies triaged and contained same day with documented actions.
success_criteria.warning: Investigations delayed due to data gaps or awaiting user confirmation (<8h).
success_criteria.fail: Confirmed malicious login without containment or repeat anomalies from same source.

tasks.name: OAuth/OIDC/SCIM Application Audit
tasks.objective: Validate third-party IDCS integrations for least privilege and secure configuration.

steps: List confidential/public apps added or updated in past 30 days with emphasis on last 24h.
Review redirect URIs, grant types, scopes, token lifetime, client secret age, and ownership.
Disable or quarantine unused or suspicious apps through change control.

success_criteria.pass: No wildcard redirects, secrets rotated per policy, scopes justified, usage documented.
success_criteria.warning: Apps pending owner verification or scheduled rotation.
success_criteria.fail: Unapproved high-privilege scopes, stale secrets in use, or rogue application discovered.

tasks.name: Public Exposure and Storage Review
tasks.objective: Eliminate unintended public access to storage and services.

steps: Enumerate Object Storage buckets for public ACLs and new pre-authenticated requests.
Review load balancers, API Gateways, and web listeners for internet exposure; validate WAF and TLS 1.2+.
Scan security lists/NSGs for 0.0.0.0/0 on admin ports and ensure Bastion/VPN enforcement.

success_criteria.pass: No sensitive buckets public; all public endpoints behind WAF with strong TLS; admin ports restricted.
success_criteria.warning: Temporary public PARs with documented expiry or pending WAF attachment.
success_criteria.fail: Sensitive buckets public, admin ports exposed, or TLS versions below policy.

tasks.name: Network Egress and DNS Monitoring
tasks.objective: Detect unauthorized egress, command-and-control, and data exfiltration patterns.

steps: Validate route tables, service gateways, and NSGs enforce controlled egress per subnet sensitivity.
Review VCN flow logs and DNS logs for unusual destinations, high entropy domains, and rare ports.
Escalate anomalies for blocking at NSG/WAF after approval.

success_criteria.pass: No unauthorized 0.0.0.0/0 egress; anomalies investigated or blocked.
success_criteria.fail: Confirmed malicious egress persists >4h or unexplained data transfer anomalies.

tasks.name: Detector Coverage and Service Onboarding
tasks.objective: Ensure Cloud Guard detectors cover all active regions and services.

steps: Inventory resources per compartment/region and compare with enabled detector families.
Enable missing detectors or adjust recipes to match enterprise baseline.
Document onboarding status and exceptions.

success_criteria.pass: Detector coverage equals 100% of active services/regions.
success_criteria.warning: Detector gaps identified with open change ticket.
success_criteria.fail: Active resources lacking detector coverage for >24h.

tasks.name: Key Management and Secrets Hygiene
tasks.objective: Maintain healthy lifecycle for encryption keys and secrets.

steps: List KMS keys with rotation dates, pending deletion, and enabled state; confirm workloads use valid keys.
Verify Block/Object/DB encryption status and customer-managed key requirements.
Review Vault secrets nearing expiry and schedule rotations.

success_criteria.pass: No disabled/expired keys in use; secret rotations scheduled before threshold.
success_criteria.warning: Keys/secrets approaching expiry with owner acknowledgment but not yet rotated.
success_criteria.fail: Workloads using expired/disabled keys or secrets past expiry causing decrypt failures.
